Skills.Name: Ride the Waves
Skills.Description: Lowers DEF of all enemies within 100 cm of target enemy by <color=red>{0}%</color> for 10s. Further inflicts <color=red>{1}%</color> Distributed DMG.
Skills.ShortDescription: Lowers DEF of all enemies within range, inflicts Distributed DMG

Skills.Name: Sunny Day
Skills.Description: Raises own ATK by <color=red>{0}%</color> for 20s. Further raises DMG Inflicted by <color=red>{1}%</color> for 20s. Raises Speed of all allies by <color=red>{2}%</color> for 20s.
Skills.ShortDescription: Raises own ATK and DMG Inflicted. Raises Speed of all allies

Skills.Name: The Perfect Split
Skills.Description: Inflicts <color=red>{0}%</color> Distributed DMG on all enemies within 100 cm of target enemy.
Skills.ShortDescription: Inflicts Distributed DMG on all enemies within range

Skills.Name: Strike Combo
Skills.Description: Inflicts <color=red>75.00%-1500.00%</color> DMG according to Combo Bonus.

Skills.Name: Lost in Summer
Skills.Description: At start of Wave, raises Speed of all allies by <color=red>{0}%</color> for 60s. Further raises DMG Inflicted by <color=red>{1}%</color> for 60s and ACC by {2}% for 60s if Blue Elemental.
Skills.ShortDescription: At start of Wave, raises Speed of all allies, raises DMG Inflicted and ACC if Blue Elemental

Skills.Description: Lowers DEF of all enemies within 100 cm of target enemy by <color=red>{0}%</color> for 10s. Further inflicts <color=red>{1}%</color> Distributed DMG.
Skills.ShortDescription: Lowers DEF of all enemies within range, inflicts Distributed DMG

Skills.Name: Sunny Day +
Skills.Description: Raises own ATK by <color=red>{0}%</color> for 20s. Further raises DMG Inflicted by <color=red>{1}%</color> for 20s. Raises Speed of all allies by <color=red>{2}%</color> for 20s.
Skills.ShortDescription: Raises own ATK and DMG Inflicted. Raises Speed of all allies

Skills.Description: Inflicts <color=red>{0}%</color> Distributed DMG on all enemies within 100 cm of target enemy.
Skills.ShortDescription: Inflicts Distributed DMG on all enemies within range

Skills.Name: Lost in Summer +
Skills.Description: At start of Wave, raises Speed of all allies by <color=red>{0}%</color> for 60s. Also raises DMG Inflicted by <color=red>{1}%</color> for 60s. Further raises ACC by {2}% for 60s if Blue Elemental.
Skills.ShortDescription: At start of Wave, raises Speed and DMG Inflicted of all allies, raises ACC if Blue Elemental

Skills.Name: Lost in Summer: Alpha Only
Skills.Description: At start of Wave, shields DMG ({0}% of skill user's ATK) of self for 60s. Further raises ATK by <color=red>{1}%</color> for 60s.
Skills.ShortDescription: At start of Wave, shields DMG of self, raises own ATK
